title: 有关Minecraft方块展会
author: a=bmfy
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a=bmfy 于 2014-4-13 15:29 编辑 

Jeb: 下个星期四，也就是4月17日11：00（欧洲中部时间）将举行“方块展会”。Minecraft、Scrolls和其他一大堆的Mojang工作人员将在斯德哥尔摩建筑与设计博物馆和大家见面。我们打算呆到12：30。想问我们问题？想拍几张照片？随你便~


也就是说和天朝没啥关系→_→



原文
Next Thursday, April 17 at 11:00 CET, most of the Minecraft team, parts of the Scrolls team, and a bunch of other Mojang peeps will head over to the Blockholm exhibition at the Museum of Architecture and Design here in Stockholm. We plan to stay until 12:30 or so.  Ask us questions! Maybe take a couple of pictures?  See you there!
